vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἑτερο-ζῠγέω,
draw unequally, [Refs 2nd c.AD+] to be yoked in unequal partnership with unbelievers, [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to yoke together in a mismatch
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to yoke together in a mismatch
to be unequally yoked, or matched, 2Cor. 6:14*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: (動物種類不同,軛也不同)負軛不平均,配錯對 (林後 6:14)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: (动物种类不同,轭也不同)负轭不平均,配错对 (林后 6:14)
